page.title: 05THE GOVERNMENT OF SHALBOURNE
page.content: The village is part of{Shalbourne {Parish}in{Shalbourne Ward}of{Kennet {Council.}It has a Parish Council which maintains the village green, monitors applications for planning permission, overlooks the rights of way and makes {representations}to the{District/County {Councils}when services within their responsibility fall short of expecta- tions. It also acts as liaison between those Councils and local inhabitants. They nominate{two Trustees of the {Parish Charity}and{one School Governor and{a member of the Village Hall Com- {mittee. }Unlike many parishes, the {Recreation Ground}is controlled by an independent committee elected annually which provides accommodation for foot- ball, cricket clubs and hard tennis court. Similarly, the Village Hall is managed by a committee under a scheme prepared by the Ministry of Education.
